faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Learn more about our video object removal feature

items.title: What types of elements can be removed from videos?
items.description: Our AI can efficiently remove various elements such as people, logos, text, props, and other distractions, intelligently filling in the background.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed completely free to use?
items.description: Yes! Users receive 30 free credits each day, enabling the removal of unwanted elements from numerous videos. Additional credits can be earned, and subscriptions are available for higher volume users.

items.title: Can I use my edited videos for commercial purposes?
items.description: Paid subscribers can use their edited videos commercially. Free-tier users are limited to personal use, and we recommend reviewing our Terms of Service for specifics.

items.title: How is my privacy ensured during processing?
items.description: All video edits are performed directly in your browser, ensuring privacy. Your videos are never uploaded or stored externally.
